statements: DELETE FROM feedback_survey WHERE rating > 3 AND survey_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM feedback_survey WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE age < 18);
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE student_id = 100 AND survey_question = 'Favorite Color';
DELETE FROM evaluations WHERE student_id = 200 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score < 60);
DELETE FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id = 1 AND student_id = 101;
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1001 AND student_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Surveys WHERE survey_id = 201 AND survey_name LIKE 'Health%';
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 1 AND major = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM surveys WHERE topic = 'Student Satisfaction' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1 AND student_id = 2 AND rating < 3;
